name: Search Candy
description:
Search Candy was founded in 2014 by Colin McDermott, an SEO and digital marketing expert who has worked in Manchester for over a decade.
We provide SEO, Training, WordPress, Content Marketing and Blogger Outreach solutions from our HQ in Salford, Manchester, UK.
Our customers trust us to be both ethical and transparent, as well as to provide a strong and measurable ROI on everything we do.
